General.Name: Anxin Trust Co Ltd
General.Description: J-Yuan Trust Co., Ltd. operates as a trust company in China. It also engages in loan, leasing, investment, interbank deposit, interbank lending, etc. activities. The company was formerly known as Anxin Trust Co., Ltd and changed its name to J-Yuan Trust Co., Ltd. in May 2023. J-Yuan Trust Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. J-Yuan Trust Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Shanghai Di'an Investment Management Co., Ltd.
